basic.description: The course has two components.   A 7 week (26 hour)  series of discussions on assigned readings, selected readings and a 45 minute presentation by each student on medical and ethical aspects of obstetrics, gynaecology, endocrinology, population and gender health and psychology.  The second component is a 50 hour Human Placenta Research Summer Workshop.   Summer Term.   Dr. B.A. Croy
basic.subject: ANAT
basic.title: Selected Topics In Pregnancy
